fhe-counter.description: A confidential counter using FHEVM to securely increment and track values. Demonstrates basic encrypted arithmetic and state management in a privacy-preserving environment.

encrypt-single-value.description: Master the FHE encryption mechanism by learning how to securely capture and store single encrypted values. Highlights essential security patterns and common pitfalls.

encrypt-multiple-values.description: Learn to handle multiple encrypted values in a single transaction efficiently. Covers batch encryption techniques and best practices for managing complex private states.

user-decrypt-single-value.description: Explore user-initiated decryption where only authorized owners can view private data. Covers the FHEVM permission system and secure re-encryption keys.

user-decrypt-multiple-values.description: Unlock multiple encrypted values simultaneously for an authorized user. Shows efficient decryption workflows and managing complex access permissions for private data.

public-decrypt-single-value.description: Convert a private FHE value into a public state readable by everyone on-chain. Ideal for revealing competition winners or outcomes that must satisfy private conditions.

public-decrypt-multiple-values.description: Simultaneously reveal multiple encrypted values to the public ledger. Essential for batch-revealing game results while maintaining privacy during the computation phase.

fhe-add.description: Perform trustless addition on encrypted numbers without ever seeing raw data. Shows how FHE addition allows computing totals while keeping inputs completely confidential.

fhe-if-then-else.description: Implement conditional logic on encrypted values using FHE.select. Learn how to branch contract execution based on private conditions without leaking info about the data.

erc7984-erc20-wrapper.description: Transform standard ERC20 tokens into privacy-preserving ERC7984 tokens. Enables existing assets to benefit from FHEVM's confidential transfers and balance protection.

erc7984-example.description: Full confidential token implementation based on ERC7984. Features private minting and balance management using FHEVM to ensure transaction amounts stay secret.

vesting-wallet-confidential.description: Automate private token releases with a confidential vesting wallet. Manages linear schedules where release amounts and current holdings remain hidden from the public.

swap-erc7984-to-erc20.description: Securely exchange confidential ERC7984 tokens for standard ERC20 tokens. Shows how to bridge privacy-enabled assets back to transparent ecosystems while managing slippage.

swap-erc7984-to-erc7984.description: Enable completely private swaps between two confidential ERC7984 tokens. An AMM-style swap where both input and output amounts stay encrypted during the entire trade.

blind-auction.description: Sealed-bid auction where all bids are submitted as encrypted FHE values. The winner is determined privately on-chain, ensuring no participant can see others' bids.

access-control.description: Master FHEVM access control using FHE.allow and allowTransient. Essential for managing who can compute on handles, ensuring private data never leaks to unauthorized users.

anti-patterns.description: Avoid security and performance mistakes by studying common FHEVM anti-patterns. Learn about side-channel leaks and gas-intensive operations to build robust contracts.

handle-lifecycle.description: Deep dive into FHE handle lifecycles, from creation to storage and derivation. Understand how handles point to encrypted data and how to manage them effectively.

input-proofs.description: Verify encrypted input integrity using cryptographic proofs. explains why input proofs are vital for preventing malicious data injection and ensuring data validity.

fhe-eq.description: Compare encrypted values for equality without revealing contents.

fhe-sub.description: Execute subtraction on encrypted values securely.

dark-pool.description: Build a high-privacy trading venue where order prices and sizes are hidden. Uses FHEVM to match trades privately, preventing front-running and protecting trading intent.

private-vault.description: Create a secure asset vault where deposits, withdrawals, and balances are confidential. Manage funds on-chain without exposing treasury details to the public.

secret-voting.description: Revolutionize governance with anonymous voting! Ensures individual votes stay encrypted while being aggregated on-chain, protecting voter privacy and preventing bias.

anonymous-whistle.description: A secure whistleblowing platform that protects reporter identity using FHEVM. Enables submission of encrypted reports that can only be decrypted by authorized parties.

fair-dice.description: Provably fair on-chain randomness using a commit-reveal scheme with FHE. Ensures neither players nor the house can influence dice rolls, providing a private experience.

private-messaging.description: Send and receive private messages directly on-chain. Message content is encrypted for the recipient only, allowing secure, decentralized communication without relayers.

secret-tip.description: Reward contributors anonymously with hidden tip amounts. Allows users to send support without revealing values, maintaining financial privacy for both parties.

basic.name: Basic FHEVM Examples
basic.description: Explore the building blocks of FHEVM. This category covers fundamental operations like encryption, decryption, arithmetic, and conditional logic for building private smart contracts.

deep-dive.name: Deep Dive Examples
deep-dive.description: Explore advanced FHEVM concepts and patterns. This category covers complex use cases like access control, anti-patterns, and lifecycle management for building private smart contracts.

openzeppelin.name: OpenZeppelin Confidential Contracts
openzeppelin.description: Leverage the power of OpenZeppelin with FHEVM. Features standard-compliant confidential tokens (ERC7984), secure wrappers, and privacy-preserving vesting schedules.

advanced.name: Advanced Examples
advanced.description: Go beyond the basics with complex FHEVM use cases. sophisticated patterns like private messaging, whistleblowing, and multi-stage protocols that push on-chain privacy boundaries.

finance.name: Finance Examples
finance.description: Modernize DeFi with complete transaction privacy. Explore advanced financial apps like dark pools, private vaults, and secret voting where trade details remain hidden from public view.

fhe-counter.title: FHE Counter
fhe-counter.description: Learn how to build a confidential counter using FHEVM. This guide demonstrates secure state management and incrementing values without revealing their actual contents.

encrypt-single-value.title: Encrypt Single Value
encrypt-single-value.description: Master the FHE encryption mechanism and explore how to securely capture single values. Includes detailed explanations of security patterns and common developer pitfalls.

encrypt-multiple-values.title: Encrypt Multiple Values
encrypt-multiple-values.description: Understand how to handle multiple encrypted values in a single transaction. Covers batch encryption best practices and managing complex encrypted states in smart contracts.

user-decrypt-single-value.title: User Decrypt Single Value
user-decrypt-single-value.description: Explore user-initiated decryption and the FHEVM permission system. Learn how to securely reveal private data only to authorized owners using re-encryption keys.

user-decrypt-multiple-values.title: User Decrypt Multiple Values
user-decrypt-multiple-values.description: Unlock multiple encrypted values simultaneously for authorized users. This guide shows efficient decryption workflows and complex access permission management in FHEVM.

fhe-add.title: FHE Add
fhe-add.description: Perform trustless addition on encrypted numbers. Learn how FHE addition allows computing balances or tallies on-chain while keeping individual inputs completely private.

fhe-if-then-else.title: FHE If-Then-Else
fhe-if-then-else.description: Implement conditional logic on encrypted values using FHE.select. Learn how to branch contract logic based on private conditions without leaking any underlying data.

public-decrypt-single-value.title: Public Decrypt Single Value
public-decrypt-single-value.description: Convert private FHE values into public states readable by everyone. Ideal for revealing competition winners or settling results that must satisfy private conditions.

public-decrypt-multiple-values.title: Public Decrypt Multiple Values
public-decrypt-multiple-values.description: Simultaneously reveal multiple encrypted values to the public ledger. Essential for batch-revealing results while maintaining privacy during the computation phase.

erc7984-erc20-wrapper.title: ERC7984 ERC20 Wrapper
erc7984-erc20-wrapper.description: Transform standard ERC20 tokens into privacy-preserving ERC7984 tokens. This wrapper enables existing assets to benefit from FHEVM's confidential transfers and balance protection.

erc7984-example.title: ERC7984 Example
erc7984-example.description: A full-featured confidential token based on the ERC7984 standard. Learn about private minting, burning, and balance management using FHEVM to ensure transaction privacy.

vesting-wallet-confidential.title: Vesting Wallet Confidential
vesting-wallet-confidential.description: Automate private token releases with a confidential vesting wallet. Manage linear vesting schedules where release amounts and current holdings remain hidden from the public.

swap-erc7984-to-erc20.title: Swap ERC7984 To ERC20
swap-erc7984-to-erc20.description: Exchange confidential ERC7984 tokens for standard ERC20 tokens securely. bridge privacy-enabled assets back to transparent ecosystems while managing slippage privately.

swap-erc7984-to-erc7984.title: Swap ERC7984 To ERC7984
swap-erc7984-to-erc7984.description: Enable private swaps between two confidential ERC7984 tokens. An AMM-style swap where both input and output amounts stay encrypted during the entire trade process.

blind-auction.title: Blind Auction
blind-auction.description: Trustless sealed-bid auctions where bids are submitted as encrypted values. The winner is determined privately on-chain, ensuring bids stay secret until the reveal phase.

access-control.title: Access Control
access-control.description: Master FHEVM access control using FHE.allow and allowTransient. Essential for managing who can compute on or decrypt handles, ensuring private data never leaks.

anti-patterns.title: Anti Patterns
anti-patterns.description: Avoid security and performance mistakes by studying common FHEVM anti-patterns. Learn about side-channel leaks, improper handle usage, and gas-intensive operations.

handle-lifecycle.title: Handle Lifecycle
handle-lifecycle.description: Understand the lifecycle of FHE handles, from creation to storage and derivation. Learn how to manage handles effectively across multiple contract calls and transactions.

input-proofs.title: Input Proofs
input-proofs.description: Verify encrypted input integrity using cryptographic proofs. explains why input proofs are vital for preventing malicious data injection and ensuring data validity in FHEVM.

fhe-eq.title: FHE Equality Comparison
fhe-eq.description: Master FHE.eq() to compare encrypted values without revealing contents.

fhe-sub.title: FHE Subtraction
fhe-sub.description: Learn to use FHE.sub() for subtracting encrypted values securely.

dark-pool.title: Dark Pool
dark-pool.description: Build high-privacy trading venues where order prices and sizes are kept hidden. Match trades privately using FHEVM, preventing front-running and protecting trading intent.

private-vault.title: Private Vault
private-vault.description: Secure asset vaults where user deposits, withdrawals, and balances are confidential. ideal for institutional users managing funds on-chain without exposing treasury details.

secret-voting.title: Secret Voting
secret-voting.description: Anonymous on-chain voting where individual votes stay encrypted while being aggregated. Final results are revealed publicly, protecting voter privacy and preventing bias.

anonymous-whistle.title: Anonymous Whistle
anonymous-whistle.description: A secure whistleblowing platform protecting reporter identity using FHEVM. Enables individuals to submit encrypted reports that can only be decrypted by authorized parties.

fair-dice.title: Fair Dice
fair-dice.description: Provably fair on-chain randomness using a commit-reveal scheme with FHE. Ensures that neither the player nor the house can influence or predict the dice roll results.

private-messaging.title: Private Messaging
private-messaging.description: Send and receive private messages directly on-chain. Message content is encrypted for the recipient only, allowing secure, decentralized communication without relayers.

secret-tip.title: Secret Tip
secret-tip.description: Reward creators or contributors anonymously with hidden tip amounts. Enables users to send support without revealing values, maintaining financial privacy for all parties.
